target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and startup founders without social media presence or advertising experience
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Greg mentions having 500,000 followers, indicating significant audience for startup content

problems_validated.problem: Getting customers and leads without social media presence or paid advertising
problems_validated.severity: Critical - described as 'probably one of the biggest questions I get asked'
problems_validated.current_solutions: Social media influencing, paid ads, content creation
problems_validated.market_gap: Many entrepreneurs refuse to use social media or don't know how to run ads effectively

products_tools.name: Google Sheets/Excel
products_tools.use_case: Creating Dream 100 list for partner research

products_tools.name: Product Hunt
products_tools.use_case: Partnership opportunities for reaching startup founders

products_tools.name: Startup Empire
products_tools.use_case: Private membership for startup builders seeking content, co-founders, and tutorials

business_strategies.strategy: Dream 100 Method - partnering with people who already have access to your target audience
business_strategies.implementation: Create spreadsheet with partner names, websites, social media links, audience size research
business_strategies.expected_results: Contacting one person can get more leads than months of other activities
business_strategies.case_study: Web design agency targeting startup founders through podcast hosts and meetup organizers

business_strategies.strategy: Utilizing groups and communities to get customers and leads
business_strategies.implementation: Find local meetups, entrepreneur organizations, online communities
business_strategies.expected_results: Direct access to concentrated target audiences
business_strategies.case_study: Entrepreneurs organization meetups happening weekly in cities

business_strategies.strategy: Creating high-quality videos and content that spreads within target audiences
business_strategies.implementation: Focus on content ideas that will spread within specific audience segments

problems_solutions.problem: Getting first customers with zero audience and no advertising budget
problems_solutions.solution: Dream 100 method combined with community engagement and targeted content
steps: Research their audiences and contact info
Create content that spreads in target communities
problems_solutions.time_estimate: One day for initial research project

startup_ideas.idea: Web design agency targeting startup founders
startup_ideas.target_market: Small businesses and startups needing websites
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Professional web design for growing businesses
startup_ideas.validation: Through Dream 100 partnerships and community engagement
startup_ideas.investment_needed: Minimal - mainly time for outreach and relationship building

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Thinking you need a large social media following to get customers
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Delays starting business and acquiring first customers
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Use Dream 100 method and community partnerships instead
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Many successful entrepreneurs never use social media but still get leads

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Believing ads don't work without trying to understand them
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing out on effective customer acquisition channel
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Take time to learn advertising fundamentals
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People who think ads don't work even though that's not true

steps: List people/orgs with your target audience
growth_tactics.results_expected: Access to established audiences without building your own

steps: Find relevant meetups in your city
growth_tactics.results_expected: Direct access to concentrated target audiences

trends_signals.trend: Entrepreneurs avoiding traditional social media marketing
trends_signals.opportunity: Services and methods that help businesses grow without social media presence

actionable_quotes.quote: contacting one of these people gets you more leads or gets you more customers than like three months of doing other stuff
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining the power of the Dream 100 method
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize partnership outreach over other marketing activities

actionable_quotes.quote: step one is just making a list of people or organizations or meetups or like containers where the people you want to work with are already being talked to
actionable_quotes.actionability: Start with research and list-building before any outreach

key_statistics.context: Used as example of why his advice might seem easy to implement

comment_insights.insight: Strong audience loyalty and engagement with startup content - viewers have daily routines around consuming this content
comment_insights.evidence: morning routine: -stretching -making a coffee -check if greg has uploaded a new video
comment_insights.author: @@pabloschz_
comment_insights.relevance: Shows high engagement and habit formation around startup education content

comment_insights.insight: Content attracts professionals from unrelated industries who become addicted to startup content
comment_insights.evidence: As a freight broker for the past 26 years, I have no idea why I watched this video. I have been addicted since I met you a couple days ago. I watched 9 videos so far and over 12 hours of content
comment_insights.author: @@MillisaNwokolo
comment_insights.relevance: Indicates broad appeal beyond core startup audience, suggesting larger addressable market

comment_insights.insight: Viewers are actively implementing the Dream 100 strategy and building tools around it
comment_insights.evidence: I built a free tool inspired by what I learned in this episode. It helps anyone easily create their own Dream 100 list
comment_insights.author: @@TotoAlphaAI
comment_insights.relevance: Shows immediate practical application and tool development opportunity around the concept

top_validated_comments.comment: Greg, it's my pleasure mate. I'm a startup ideas junkie too, and this is our community! Thanks for all you do, I hope our paths someday cross.
top_validated_comments.author: @@RyanStephenAlldridge
top_validated_comments.business_value: Highest engagement comment shows strong community feeling and Canadian audience presence

top_validated_comments.comment: comment/like/subscribe for more of this in your feed AND to have Jicecream back on SIP!
top_validated_comments.author: @@GregIsenberg
top_validated_comments.business_value: Host actively engaging with audience and promoting guest return indicates successful content format

top_validated_comments.comment: Jonathan, you have sooo much great stuff to share - I truly feel you for not wanting to be an 'influencer', but man - in a world of Dunning Kruger sucky fluff type content everywhere, we needed more p
top_validated_comments.author: @@tobiasburkhardt-389
top_validated_comments.business_value: Validates demand for high-quality, non-influencer business content and criticism of existing content quality

comment_derived_trends.trend: High engagement with practical, actionable business content
supporting_comments: viewers building tools based on episodes
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Strong market demand for practical startup education content and tools
Startup education market extends beyond just entrepreneurs to professionals in other industries

supporting_comments: putting Greg in their Dream 100 list
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Strategy resonates and gets immediate implementation, indicating strong product-market fit for this methodology

meta.title: How to get your first customers (even with ZERO audience)
